plot: A foundry owner saves a tramp from snow. The tramp rapes his daughter and is thrown into a furnace by workmen.
title: A Father's Vengeance
plot_es: A foundry owner saves a tramp from snow. The tramp rapes his daughter and is thrown into a furnace by workmen.
plot_en: A foundry owner saves a tramp from snow. The tramp rapes his daughter and is thrown into a furnace by workmen.
